member.summary: Generates a full file path for saving a tenant-specific billing invoice as a PDF. Ensures the target directory exists by creating it if necessary.
member.param: The name of the tenant, used to create a subfolder and personalize the filename.
The billing due date, formatted as "MMMM_yyyy" and embedded in the filename.
member.returns: A string representing the full file path for the PDF invoice, including folder and filename.
member.exception: Thrown if the directory cannot be created due to an I/O error.
Thrown if the application lacks permission to create the directory or write to the path.
